title: Tracking and recording of intracellular oxygen concentration changes in cell organelles: preparation and function of azide-modified fluorescent probes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19586-19591
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01625D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hiroki Makanai, Miei Kanda, Sae Harada, Tatsuya Nishihara, Kazuhito Tanabe
We attempted to design molecular probes that can be activated to show fluorescence under hypoxic conditions and that can move to specific cell organelles for tracking hypoxic environments and changes in oxygen levels.
